goals__remit: Koreneef Public Affairs (K-PA) offers an EU political and stakeholder consultancy service. Working with clients, K-PA identifies business opportunities and challenges, assisting clients to plan their strategy and the supporting engagement to address issues in good time. K-PA helps to ensure that appropriate relationships with stakeholders are built and maintained.
